H0.text: What was named after American frontiersman James Bowie. Bowie County

H1.text: What was named after American frontiersman James Bowie. Bowie Bay

H2.text: What was named after American frontiersman James Bowie. Bowie Mountain

H3.text: What was named after American frontiersman James Bowie. Knive

A4.text: The county is named for James Bowie, the legendary knife fighter who died at the Battle of the Alamo.
